The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\cacaz\\OneDrive\\Documentos\\.serviceRawFile:
service: acortador-pro
org: hikicorp

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    MONGO_URI: ${env:MONGO_URI}

functions:
  create:
    handler: handler.createShortUrl
    events:
      - http:
          path: shorten
          method: post
          cors: true
  redirect:
    handler: handler.redirectUrl
    events:
      - http:
          path: /{shortCode}
          method: get
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
